template.value: Double click to see the details

template.query:
SELECT * FROM items
ORDER BY created_at DESC
template.transformer:
// Query results are available as the `data` variable
return data

template.query:
SELECT sales.*, COALESCE(customers.firstname, '') || ' ' || COALESCE(customers.lastname, '') as customer_name, COUNT(sale_details.id) as item_count FROM sales
LEFT JOIN customers ON customers.id = sales.customer_id
LEFT JOIN sale_details ON sale_details.sale_id = sales.id
GROUP BY sales.id, customers.firstname, customers.lastname
ORDER BY created_at DESC
template.transformer:
// Query results are available as the `data` variable
return data

template.changeset: [{"key":"customer_id","value":"{{ new_customer.value }}"},{"key":"total","value":"{{ total.value }}"},{"key":"sub_total","value":"{{ total_sub.value }}"},{"key":"discount","value":"{{ discount.value }}"},{"key":"tax","value":"{{ gst.value }}"},{"key":"discount_rate","value":"{{ discount_rate.value }}"},{"key":"tax_rate","value":"{{ tax_rate.value }}"},{"key":"cash","value":"{{ cash.value }}"},{"key":"amex","value":"{{ amex.value }}"},{"key":"debit_card","value":"{{ debit_card.value }}"},{"key":"master_card","value":"{{ master_card.value }}"},{"key":"migration_variance","value":"{{ migration_variance.value }}"},{"key":"shopify","value":"{{ shopify.value }}"},{"key":"visa","value":"{{ visa.value }}"}]
template.transformer:
// Query results are available as the `data` variable
return data

template.query:
SELECT refunds.*, items.name as item_name, customers.firstname || ' ' || customers.lastname as customer_name FROM refunds
  LEFT JOIN items ON items.id = refunds.item_id
  LEFT JOIN customers ON customers.id = refunds.customer_id
ORDER BY refunds.created_at DESC
template.transformer:
// Query results are available as the `data` variable
return data
